idea-plugin.name: SQL Server Monitoring
idea-plugin.description:
A JetBrains plugin to monitor SQL Server databases directly within your IDE, including DataGrip and IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate.

Key Features:

  • Real-time monitoring of configured SQL Server data sources.
  • Performance metrics visualization:
    • CPU utilization (%)
    • Waiting tasks
    • I/O usage (MB/s)
    • Batch requests per second
    • Total TempDB size (MB)
    • RAM usage (MB)
